<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Goo Grenade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1811)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 306</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Characters from Nex have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A goo grenade is a flask filled with a fast-growing, short-lived alchemical ooze. When you hit a creature with a goo grenade, that creature takes [persistent acid damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and a circumstance penalty to its Speeds from the clinging goo.

 The target can end any penalties, conditions, and persistent damage caused by the bomb by [Escaping](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) or spending a total of 3 Interact actions to pry themselves free of the ooze. These Interact actions don't have to be consecutive, and other creatures can provide the actions as well.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Goo Grenade (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 306</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The target takes 1d4 acid damage, 1 persistent acid damage, and 1 acid splash damage. They take a –5-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds. The Escape DC is 15.

level="2"

pfs="Standard"
>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The target takes 2d4 acid damage, 2 persistent acid damage, and 2 acid splash damage. They take a –5-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds. The Escape DC is 17.

pfs="Standard"
>

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The target takes 3d4 acid damage, 3 persistent acid damage, and 3 acid splash damage. They take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds. The Escape DC is 26.

level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>

</title>

<traits>

</column>

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The target takes 4d4 acid damage, 4 persistent acid damage, and 4 acid splash damage. They take a –10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds. The Escape DC is 35.
